column1: Hello! I am Roger! This is a test script. Lets see if this string is split correctly! I hope so; Because it would be a shame if not right? Lol//.0

column2: I am Roger. While discovering Egypt
column3: I dug up this ancient gauntlet. It appears to be from ancient mayan times. I want you to have it. It has some very special powers
column4: but the only way to unlock them is through Game Progression
column5: AHHH THE AGONY! Good luck. No
column6: the gauntlet is not a turkey//.1

column1: You made it past the tutorial. This was just a test simulation. Well done. Now
column2: I am happy to provide you with your first power. Teleportation//!2
hold the SHIFT key and click within the radius to teleport there. It's power is limited
column3: there will be a cooldown with each use. Now
column4: test out your new ability to get past this wall//!3

column1: Great job teleporting past that wall
column2: you are a fast learner! These Ladders bring you to further stages! To use a ladder stand under the ladder and press W//.4

column1: Use A and D to move around//.5
Enemies are looking for The Gauntlet. Try to avoid being seen. (it won't end well)//!7
